name: Sheep Herding Game (ericklatshaw)
description:
Play as a sheepdog and herd as many sheep into the pen as possible to score points before time runs out! This was a solo project by me. Herding regular white sheep will give you 1 point and 4 additional seconds, rarer black sheep will give you 1 point but 10 additional seconds. Super rare gold sheep will give you 5 points and 10 seconds!

Sheep and Dog assets: Omabuarts Studio

Nature assets: JustCreate

Music: Vertex Studios
